headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names. Use italic variants for emphasis.

body.usage: UI elements, long-form text, navigation, buttons.

textures.paper: Subtle paper texture overlay on background

grid_system.product_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-x-8 gap-y-16

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-secondary px-8 py-4 rounded-full hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 font-medium tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: border border-primary text-primary px-8 py-4 rounded-full hover:bg-primary hover:text-secondary transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-b border-primary/20 py-3 focus:border-primary outline-none transition-colors placeholder:text-primary/40

animations.parallax: Use framer-motion useScroll and useTransform for vertical parallax on images

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Build a 'Scrollytelling' experience. The user should feel like they are exploring a map. Use sticky positioning for text while images scroll or fade in background.
instructions_to_main_agent.admin_panel: Keep the admin panel clean and functional but use the brand fonts. Do not make it look like a generic dashboard. Use the 'Secondary' color for the sidebar.
instructions_to_main_agent.quiz: The quiz should be a full-screen immersive modal. One question per screen. Smooth transitions between questions.
instructions_to_main_agent.product_page: Do not use a standard e-commerce layout. Use a split-screen layout: Left side fixed image, Right side scrollable content (Story -> Notes -> Buy).

tech_stack_specifics.styling: Use Tailwind for layout and spacing. Use CSS modules or inline styles only for complex dynamic animations.
tech_stack_specifics.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with thin stroke width (1.5px) to match the elegance.
tech_stack_specifics.state: Use React Context for the Cart and Quiz state.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use the primary charcoal color.
Ensure all images have a subtle 'zoom-out' animation on load.
Use 'lenis' for smooth scrolling if possible, or CSS 'scroll-behavior: smooth'.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
